## Web3Tokens.erc20() method

Create a builder for an ERC-20 token witch allows to add extensions such as Ownable, Mintable, Pausable, etc...

**Signature:**

```typescript
erc20(): ERC20Builder;
```
**Returns:**

ERC20Builder
